price: (98) So exalt [Allāh] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
